top_comments_top.body: Loads of pc and ps3/4 games support 3D. Also the nintendo 3DS

I remember that this was a thing for a few PS2 and PS3 games. I recall that Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves had a 3D mode and it included a pair of 3D glasses clipped in with the manual.

Maybe it was just a problem with my TV, but I wasn't impressed by it...

VR dude

Like its basically the same thing
